content.description: You will hear an excerpt in two sections. The first section of the excerpt will be played two times. Then, the second section will be played once. Before listening to each section for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: A correct rhythmic notation for the principal melodic idea in the first section is

choices.label: Dotted eighth rest, sixteenth, sixteenth, eighth, sixteenth, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth
Dotted eighth rest, sixteenth, eighth, sixteenth, sixteenth, quarter, eighth, eighth
Eighth rest, eighth, eighth, sixteenth, sixteenth, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth
Eighth rest, eighth, quarter, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth

content.answer: Eighth rest, eighth, eighth, sixteenth, sixteenth, eighth, eighth, eighth, eighth

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
